|brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WDR3600 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/10/2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WDR3600 |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7WDR3600 |icid = 8853A-WDR3600 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 2050500231 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9344;AR9344-BC2A, PBT220.000, 1311, CHINA; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 560 <!-- 560 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S25FL064KIF; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5PS5162GFR Y5C; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 3.4 |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 4-port USB hub controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, Gargoyle,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2015 |fccapprovdate = 10/16/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 845973070007 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008RV51EE |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Atheros;AR9582;AR9582-AR1A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2050500231 Rev:1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This would seem to indicate that this device shares the same board :with some models of the [[TP-LINK TL-WDR4300]].
"2050500272 Rev:1.3" would appear to be silkscreened on [https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=45607 WDR3600] :(v1.4/v1.5 boards) and perhaps some/all v1.2 boards (??). RAM and Flash may vary: 2x W9751G6KB-25 and W25Q64FVSIG is used on some units.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos for the <small>('''US''' sold, obv.)</small> device is a :'''HuntKey''' HKA01812015-2K (100-240VAC ~50/60Hz, 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A) The coaxial power connector on the device would appear to be an '''EIAJ-04'''.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.tp-link.com/resources/simulator/TL-WDR3600/Index.htm Firmware Interface] {{•}} [http://www.tplink.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WDR3600&version=V1 Downloads]
===Firmware project forum posts / wiki pages=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=710430 On the '''DD-WRT Forums'''] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wdr3600 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :The v1.1 unit shown has "2050500231 Rev:1.0" silkscreened on the board.
